1.name: wordpress/cancanit-review-widget
1.description:
This is the CancanIT WordPress widget version for your website or blog. It's very helpful for getting ranks and reviews from your users or readers. Please, support the plugin sharing it to your friends and colleagues.

  • Support http://cancanit.com/guides/

Features

  • 3 default useful styles (default, dark, light)
  • Title length.
  • Color schemes.
  • Limitation of reviews.
  • Customization
